### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE campaign_keyword_targeting (
  campaign_id INT NOT NULL,
  keyword VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  match_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  bid DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (campaign_id, keyword)
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE campaign_keyword_targeting SET bid = 5.00 WHERE campaign_id = 1 AND keyword = 'programming'

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE keyword_targets (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    keyword TEXT,
    search_volume INT,
    bid DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE campaigns (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE ad_groups (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    name TEXT,
    status TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ads (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_group_id INT,
    headline TEXT,
    description TEXT,
    display_url TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE metrics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_id INT,
    impressions INT,
    clicks INT,
    cost DECIMAL
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE keyword_targets SET search_volume = 100 WHERE id = 1;
